articles.title: Surprising Phenomena Observed by NASA's NuSTAR in Brightest Cosmic Explosion Ever Detected - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Observations by NASA’s NuSTAR X-ray telescope give astronomers new clues about the brightest and most energetic gamma-ray burst ever detected. Scientists detected the brightest gamma-ray burst ever, dubbed GRB 221009A or BOAT, in October 2022. Unlike previous…
articles.content:
